name: Rick McWood
description:
The game plays a lot better and more fluid on the Windows Version

Rick McWood is a submission for the Bullet Hell Jam.
The theme is 10 seconds and needs to be a game of the Bullet Hell Genre.

Rick McWood the former marionette has decided to take down the crimes that has corrupted the town. The once peaceful town has gotten stuck between 3 realms of realities and it's only Rick McWood that can stop this madness. One of those projects were you started out way too ambitious with not enough time and experience to pull this through.

Controls

ASDW - For movement

Mouse Arrow to aim
Mouse left click - to shoot or do actions.
R - To reload scene.
SPACE to proceed through the Menu

Programming and everything involved with Unity:
Zlaktarn

Sound Effects and Music: 
Alexander and Izak

Art:
Alexander

Animation
Mixamo for enemy shoot animation.

Should be downloaded and played but due to issues during Build, it never got submitted.
